sourcesContent:
Get a ${{ referral_credit }} Bonus By Inviting Your Friends!

When a referral is successfull, both of you get $ {{ referral_credit }} into your accounts

Your friend {{referrer_name}} referred you to our referral program! Share the link with your friends and when someone signs up or makes a purchase using your link, both you and your friend receive a reward. {{referral_link}}   {{company_name}}

Invite Your Friends

{{ c.Name }}

Program Details
  1. A referral program rewards individuals for referring others to a product or service, incentivizing word-of-mouth marketing.
  2. Referrers receive a unique code or link to share with their friends, making it easy to track and attribute successful referrals.
  3. When friends use the referral code or link to access the product or service, they become referred customers, and referrers earn rewards based on their actions.
  4. Referral programs benefit businesses by acquiring new customers, increasing sales, and building brand loyalty, while also providing incentives and special offers to referred customers.

Purchase and Win a Holiday!

Ready to turn your travel dreams into reality? Visit VoyageScope now and enter our "Win a Dream Holiday" contest! Explore our curated travel packages, indulge in unforgettable experiences, and enjoy seamless arrangements. With each purchase, you automatically enter for a chance to win an incredible vacation package. Don't miss out! Start your journey today and get closer to winning the holiday of your dreams. Happy travels!

Sign up

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ReferralServiceService } from '../services/referral-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-referral', templateUrl: './referral.component.html', styleUrls: ['./referral.component.scss'] }) export class ReferralComponent implements OnInit{ contacts :any ngOnInit(): void { this.service.get_contacts().subscribe(res => this.contacts = res) console.log(this.contacts, '#contacts') } constructor (private service: ReferralServiceService) {} referral_credit: Number = 7 current_user: string = "Your friend's name" referrer_name: string = "referrer's name" referral_link: string = "referral link" company_name: string = "company's name" company_web_address: string = "company's website address" review_image: string = "./../../assets/images/Design inspiration-bro.png" review_link: string = "" program_description: string = "" program_starting_date: string = "" program_due_date: string = "" program_period: Number = 180 program_reward: string = "Referral Program Rewards" }
